overview: Straight buddy Michael DelRay earns himself an invite to the festival after blowing his leather clad friend Jake Davis. When gambler Griffin Barrows loses his paycheck at the tables, boyfriend Dante Martin asks for his ass in exchange for his share of the rent. When Quentin Gainz' wife leaves town, escort Dalton Briggs fulfills his ultimate gay fantasy. Gabriel Cross convinces his straight married neighbor Jake Davis to test out the benefits of an open relationship.
title: Love That Bareback Action
